dict.string: We request calendar access to help users manage appointments, schedule customer interactions, and organize events directly within the app.
We request camera access to enable users to capture and upload high-quality photos, enhancing the functionality of features like profile updates, document uploads, and visual sharing within the app.
We request file access to allow users to upload, view, and share PDF documents securely, supporting key app features like document sharing and efficient communication.
We request location access to provide location-based personalization and improve user experiences, such as identifying nearby services and tailoring app content to your location.
We request microphone access to facilitate voice messaging and communication, enabling seamless audio interaction between users and customer support within the app.
We request access to your photo library to enable you to select and upload photos for use in features like profile updates, document submissions, and chat interactions.

We use tracking to deliver personalized experiences and better understand user engagement across our app and connected platforms. This data helps us improve app functionality and tailor services to your preferences.
